name: Speed Simulator (Brett_Dev)
description:
Welcome to Speed Simulator!

Run around the map to get faster!

This game may take a bit to load..

Have fun! If you have any suggestions, tell me in the comments!

Use WASD keys to move..

Changelogs(5/24/22):

--Removed the Welcome Menu

--Added fullscreen support

--Added more stuff into the map

--You now earn more speed every time you level up

-----

Changelogs(5/26/22)

--Added back the Welcome menu

--Changed the ground color

-- The cube rotates now

Also, I recommend that you play on full screen. The big GUS could probably get in the way/
